title: Sam Sanders LP 70's - FONT ID
content:
Looking for a font ID on the chunky bold font used for this 70's LP cover.

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140420013140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-01-17%20at%209_4792.53.00%20AM%20copy.png)

author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: better image to see type more clearly here - [http://www.soundsoftheuniverse.com/img/releases/33397/w/3\_sam\_sanders\_fr...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140420013140/http:/www.soundsoftheuniverse.com/img/releases/33397/w/3_sam_sanders_front_1_1024x1024.jpg "http://www.soundsoftheuniverse.com/img/releases/33397/w/3\_sam\_sanders\_front\_1\_1024x1024.jpg")

Seems to be Bitstream Futura Rounded.
